post_title: For Trade: Speaker T206 American Beauty, SGC 1 - TRADED
post_content:
Looking to see what might be out there for trade offers on this Tris Speaker AB, SGC 1. PMs are best way to reach me. Not selling at this point.
I have a Google folder with other trade fodder (mostly 1950s and up, but includes a 1948 Leaf Ted), in case something else catches an eye: [URL="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1S3TMsXjuV6GI7qpL3FfdxMsYYaw1_KTQ"]Trade Folder Link.[/URL]

Update: the Speaker has been traded. Thanks for all the inquiries!
What is your trade value on this?
